text: evan tan iraivanutaiya vacanankalaik kontu upatecikkappattum avarraip purakkanittut tanniru karankalum ceyta kurrankalai marantu vitukirano avanai vitap periya akkiramakkaran evan irukkinran? Niccayamaka nam avarkalutaiya irutayankalin mitu, itai vilankik kollatavaru tiraikalaiyum, avarkalutaiya cevikalil cevittuttanattaiyum erpatuttiyirukkirom; atalal nir avarkalai nervaliyin pal alaittalum, avarkal oru potum nervaliyataiya mattarkal
